Sentencas: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and oxy-fuel combustion technology is proposed.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The system is revised from a pressurized SOFC-gas turbine hybrid system to capture CO2 almost completely while maintaining high efficiency.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The system consists of SOFC, gas turbine, oxy-combustion bottoming cycle, and CO2 capture and compression process.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: An ion transport membrane (ITM) is used to separate oxygen from the cathode exit air.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The fuel cell operates at an elevated pressure to facilitate the use of the ITM, which requires high pressure and temperature.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The remaining fuel at the SOFC anode exit is completely burned with oxygen at the oxy-combustor.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Almost all of the CO2 generated during the reforming process of the SOFC and at the oxy-fuel combustor is extracted from the condenser of the oxy-combustion cycle.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The oxygen-depleted high pressure air from the SOFC cathode expands at the gas turbine.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Therefore, the expander of the oxy-combustion cycle and the gas turbine provides additional power output.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The two major design variables (steam expander inlet temperature and condenser pressure) of the oxy-fuel combustion system are determined through parametric analysis.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: There exists an optimal condenser pressure (below atmospheric pressure) in terms of global energy efficiency considering both the system power output and CO2 compression power consumption.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: It was shown that the integrated system can be designed to have almost equivalent system efficiency as the simple SOFC-gas turbine hybrid system.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: With the voltage of 0.752 V at the SOFC operating at 900 degrees C and 8 bar, system efficiency over 69.2% is predicted.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Efficiency penalty due to the CO2 capture and compression up to 150 bar is around 6.1%.
Titulo: An integrated power generation system combining solid oxide fuel cell and oxy-fuel combustion for high performance and CO2 capture
